title: Tricky Sans Serif
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112233044im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hobo_5163.png)
 I have a client who wants to imitate this, but I can't quite get it to go, either it's been stretched, which is throwing me off or it's some obscure variation of a font. Much thanks in advance if anyone can ID it…:-)
author: Castleman

comments.content:
Very close to Luxury Gold, by House Industries:  
 [http://www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112233044/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112233044im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HouseGold_6388.png)

The X in House Gold, though, is wider than the one in your sample, and the shapes of the O and C are a bit too flattened....

Dessau Pro also comes very close:  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fountain/dessau\_pro/ot\_ps](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112233044/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fountain/dessau_pro/ot_ps "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fountain/dessau\_pro/ot\_ps")
I think it's the Desau slightly stretched. Thank you so much!!!
